description:
Seth visits Melie at the inn where she`s staying, but she treats him coldly. Seth had left Artemis on his own because he didn`t want to hurt his friends with the power he couldn`t control, but Melie wanted Seth to have faith in her as his friend; the two of them just can`t see eye to eye. Seth is left with nowhere to go, but then Ocoho asks him to train with her, offering to look in the castle library for information on Radiant in return. But Seth still isn`t sure if he should be making new friends...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amaoto Shizuka ni Kokoro wa Tooku: Rain
